ota past ! bapar ta chario na !

@ piby2

are you mad ? tui nijer mail id publicly dichis kano ? toke to amar fake identity diye aneke mail karbe ! jai hok, kgp er nijosso kato gulo code ache ! toke ekta ballam ! niche dekh !

'bhajan' ! 

keu jadi toke fake mail pathay amar naam kare ta hale kgp er bad baki code gulo ask karbi ! jadi praytek tar right answer dite pare tabe bujbi se antoto kgp er chele / past ! kintu ami toke kono mail pathabo na ! karon ache ! ekrom vul tui kgp er chele haye karli ki kare ? abak halam !
Thanks u bro. I was interested in this movie too. if possible, can u add english srt for this. it will be great help. Thanks in advance.

robin bhaya, 

eta khub common code, jodi keu hack kore fele tai bhabchi :P :P.. ami onekdin holo kgp chherechi, tai latest code gulo thik janina..ta tomar songe contact korar kono upay achhe naki?

@robin bhaya,

kgp er aro koto code achhe...tumi ta shunlum CS dept, ta CS eri to koto code..feku hole oto jana ektu chap :P :P e.g. dhoro goutamer bou er nam ki :P :P
